Human HAP1 Knockout Cell Lines - WT
Human control cell line. The HAP1 cell line was bought directly from Horizon Discovery and has been control quality checked by the vendor.
Human HAP1 Knockout Cell Lines - CLPB
Human knockout cell line. The HAP1 ClpB knockout cell line was bought directly from Horizon Discovery and has been control quality checked by the vendor.
cOmplete, Mini, EDTA-free Protease Inhibitor Cocktail
